subject: Memorabilia
lead_paragraph: A large sketch of the former Kansas coach Roy Williams was removed from the men’s room of the Downtown Barbershop in Lawrence, Kan., where it had hung as a symbol of fan anger since Williams departed for North Carolina in 2003. Williams’s sketch is back where it used to be, prominently displayed among hundreds of sketches, photographs and memorabilia. Kansas beat Williams’s North Carolina team, 84-66, in the semifinals of the N.C.A.A. tournament, on its way to winning the national championship.
